about_opensource_message: We welcome contributions to this application. If you are interested, please join us on Github at
about_message_1: eos-voter is a standalone desktop application that connects directly to the EOS blockchain through the API endpoint of your choice.
about_message_2: Your keys never leave the application itself and are only ever stored encrypted, providing the highest level of security a hot wallet can offer.
about_more: Please visit us at https://greymass.com if you would like to learn more.
about_issues: If you have encounter problems with the application itself, please file an issue on github below:
about_greymass_message_1: This application is an initiative spearheaded by Greymass.
about_greymass_message_2: If you would like to learn more about our team and the other projects we have planned for EOS, we invite you to visit us at
